name: The Origins of Ember
description:
A Tiny lump of Coal and his Balloon use the power of Ember to survive harsh environments. As the last living thing on his world, he'll use his newly found power to ensure the survival of his race!

ALL Art and Music made specific for this game.

Music and sound recorded using: Piano, Bass and Ocarina.

Challenging Final Level!!! Let me know if you beat it!

CONTROLS:

  • A & D for movement
  • Spacebar for jump
  • Hold Shift to ride balloon
  • Left Mouse Button to turn on Ember and interact with: Balloon, platforms and Vents.

CREDIT:

  • Art&Design: Laiana Isabel
  • Music&Sounds: Marcos Piñeiro
  • Game Dev: Carlos Santiago
